headline: BigBear.ai Stock Rises 36% in 6 Months: Is It Still a Buy?
summary: BBAI stock rallies 36% in six months as earnings improve and its Ask Sage AI deal fuels investor momentum - but is the rally sustainable?

headline: How Recent Developments Are Shaping The Leidos Holdings Investment Story
summary: Leidos Holdings has seen its narrative evolve even as the stock’s fair value estimate held steady at $218.08 per share, with only a slight uptick in the discount rate to 7.56% reflecting a marginally higher risk environment. This measured shift is rooted in a mix of bullish enthusiasm over a robust contract pipeline and diversified growth opportunities, tempered by cautious views around government funding risks and valuation headwinds. Read on to see how you can stay on top of these narrative...
